Package edu.monash.fit2099.game.actions

This module is about the actions that can be performed by actors in the edu.monash.fit2099.game

This module explores the different actions that can be done by actors that have different capabilities or situations. Note that all actons in this package has Action abstract class as one of its parent class.

Since:
1.0.0
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AddToWalletAction
    Special PickUpItemAction that allows an actor to add coin items to wallet.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackAndFireAction
    Class representing the attack of normal Attack combined with Fire Action
    ConsumeAction
    Base ConsumeAction class that provides basic functionality required with consuming ConsumableItem objects.
    ConsumeInventoryItemAction
    Extension of ConsumeAction class that allows Players to consume items stored in their inventory.
    DestroyGroundAction
    Special DestroyGroundAction that allows an actor to destroy any ground type and turn it into dirt.
    DestroyShellAction
    Special DestroyShellAction that allows an actor to destroy the shell of a dormant Koopa.
    DormantAction
    Special Action that allows an actor to become dormant ( currently only used on Koopas ).
    DrinkFromBottleAction
    Extension of ConsumeAction class that allows Players to consume consumable items stored in their bottle.
    DrinkFromFountainAction
    Extension of ConsumeAction class that allows Enemies to consume Water objects in a fountain when they stumble upon it.
    FireAttackAction
    FireAttackAction class represents the special attack action Mario gains after consuming the FireFlower
    GetRemovedAction
    Special Action for removing/killing actors instantly
    InstaKilledAction
    Special InstaKilledAction that allows an actor to instantly kill its opponents.
    JumpAction
    This class handles the 'jump' functionality of the actor in the edu.monash.fit2099.game
    MoveMapAction
    Special Action class tasked with moving the Player entity to another map
    ObtainedAction
    Special Action class tasked with giving the player the ability to obtain Obtainable Items from Toad The act of obtaining an item requires no money, only an interaction with Toad.
    RefillBottleAction
    Special action class tasked with refilling the Players bottle with Water objects from MagicalFountains
    ResetGameAction
    Special ResetGameAction that allows an actor to reset the edu.monash.fit2099.game.
    TradeAction
    Special TradeActopm that allows an actor to trade items with Toad.
    UnlockAction
    Special action class tasked with giving the Player the ability to free Princess Peach when in possession of a key.
